## Functions

### replaceInChain() {#af2d838c2a21782ab136667456a81b2c2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static SDValue replaceInChain (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag">SelectionDAG</a> &#42; CurDAG, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Chain, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Old, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> New)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Given a chain return a new chain where any appearance of Old is replaced by New.

There must be at most one instruction between Old and Chain and this instruction must be a TokenFactor. Returns an empty <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> if these conditions don&#39;t hold.

Definition at line <a href="#l00185">185</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/xcore/xcoreiseldagtodag-cpp">XCoreISelDAGToDAG.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
